name: Mega Games Almanac
description:
Mega Games Almanac is a compilation release by the Spanish publisher 1985 Alternativo on a single cartridge.

The included games are:
  • Mega Mindtris (updated version including support for the publisher's Mega QR powered online ranking)
  • Oh Mummy Genesis
  • Uwol: Quest for Money
All three games were already released standalone previously. There are also three playable demos:
  • Antarex (2D side-scrolling shooter set in space)
  • DJ Chip Warrior (DDR-like game)
  • Tro-Now (Tron-style lightcycle game)
Of these demo games only Tro-Now was already released in full, the other two were still in development.
